knimeNode.name: Column Filter
knimeNode.shortDescription: Filters by including (or excluding) selected columns from the table.

fullDescription.intro: Allows you to filter certain columns from the input table that are then excluded from the output table. Use the buttons to move columns from one list (include or exclude) to the other.
fullDescription.option: This list contains the column names that are contained in the output table.

The search field enables you to search for column names in either the include or exclude list. Repeated clicking of the search button marks the next column that matches the search text. The check box 'Mark all search hits' causes all matching columns to be selected.
Contains the names of columns of the input table that are excluded from the output table.

ports.dataOut: Datatable with only the specified columns
